maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Satoshi!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Сатоши!

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: ... Sister...
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: ...Сестра...

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: What do you think you're doing?!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Ты вообще соображаешь, что делаешь?!

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: You are in no condition to do this kind of work now!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Ты сейчас не в том состоянии, чтобы заниматься этим!

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: All you should do is rest...
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Тебе стоит отдохнуть...

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: ... Why should I rest when I'm way beyond recovery?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: ...Зачем мне отдыхать, если отдых мне уже не поможет?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I need to finish this work. It's my final task.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Мне нужно завершить работу. Это моя последняя задача.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: ... I told you about the agreement.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: ...Я рассказывал тебе о соглашении.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I finish this and they will let you go...
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Я закончу с этим, и они тебя отпустят...

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: ... No, I don't want this!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: ...Нет, мне этого не нужно!

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Satoshi... Stop it...
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Сатоши... Остановись...

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: ... It is done.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: ...Вот и всё.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: No!!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Нет!!

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Shizuka... I'm sorry...
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Шизука... Прости...

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I'm so sorry I got you involved in this.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Прости, что я втянул тебя в это.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Just promise me...\. that you will...\. get away...
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Просто пообещай мне...\. что ты...\. выберешься отсюда...

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Please...
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Пожалуйста...

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Hello again, Lea.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Привет ещё раз, Лея.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Do you think you are prepared to execute the plan?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Как думаешь, ты готова выполнить план?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Mind that once we start, things will have to move quickly.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Имей в виду, что как только мы начнём, всё должно происходить быстро.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: So, are you ready?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Итак, ты готова?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: [nods]
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: [кивает]

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Alright then, let's get everyone together.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Ну ладно, давай соберём всех вместе.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: [shakes head]
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: [мотает головой]

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Alright. Talk to me when the time has come.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Хорошо. Поговорим, когда придёт время.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: [yes]
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: [да]

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: [no]
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: [нет]

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Hello again, Lea.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Привет ещё раз, Лея.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: You should know what to do. Let's hurry and proceed with the plan.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Ты должна знать, что делать. Давай поторопимся и приступим к выполнению плана.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: [nods]
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: [кивает]
...Привет?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Is...\. is that?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Неужели...\. это?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: It...\. it really happened.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Это...\. это действительно произошло.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Satoshi...\. finally...\. we found you!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Сатоши...\. наконец-то...\. мы нашли тебя!

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Lea...\. you are here...
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Лея...\. ты здесь...

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Does that mean...\. is he with you as well?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Значит ли это...\. что он тоже с тобой?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: [nods]
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: [кивает]

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Alright. This way, please.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Хорошо. Сюда, пожалуйста.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Make sure he can read the number of this device.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Убедись, что он сможет прочитать номер данного устройства.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: It's possible to connect to it using an IDN-Client.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: К нему можно подключиться с помощью IDN-клиента.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Oh? Just make sure to look closely at the number, Lea!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Да? Посмотри внимательно на номер, Лея!

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Alright...\. one moment please.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Хорошо...\. один момент, пожалуйста.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Satoshi...\. I am so glad to see you again.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Сатоши...\. Я так рад видеть тебя снова.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Same for me.\. It has been too long...
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Я тоже.\. Прошло так много времени...

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: S-Sergey?\. Is that you?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: С-Сергей?\. Это ты?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I'm sure you have a lot of questions, but before we continue, let me start a little program.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Я уверен, у тебя много вопросов, но перед тем, как мы продолжим, позволь мне запустить небольшую программу.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Alright, let's stay close and talk quietly.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Хорошо, оставайтесь рядом и говорите тише.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: This room is being monitored.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Эта комната под наблюдением.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Having this noise around us should sufficiently mess with the protocol.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Наличие этого шума вокруг нас должно нарушить протокол слежки.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: At least for some time.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: По крайней мере, на какое-то время.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I see...
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Понятно...

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Well then... allow me to get straight to the point.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Ну что ж... позволь мне перейти сразу к делу.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Sergey, you should already know about Evotars.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Сергей, ты уже должен знать про эвотаров.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Is Lea...\. aware about herself as well?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Лея...\. уже в курсе насчёт себя?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Yes...\. she is.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Да...\. в курсе.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: [nods]
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: [кивает]

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Good...\. this will make things much easier.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Хорошо...\. это сильно всё облегчает.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Lea, let me start by saying that you are, in fact, the \c[3]very first functional Evotar\c[0].
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Лея, позволь мне начать с того, что ты на самом деле \c[3]самый первый функционирующий эвотар\c[0].

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Minus a few remaining technical issues... like your \c[3]malfunctioning speech module\c[0].
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: За вычетом нескольких технических недочётов... вроде твоей \c[3]неисправности речевого модуля\c[0].

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Why?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Почему?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Wait...\. so I didn't imagine it? You can talk?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Подожди...\. значит, мне не показалось? Ты можешь разговаривать?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Partially... I hard-coded a few words into her module.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Частично... Я запрограммировал несколько слов в её модуль.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I wasn't even aware that was an option...
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Я даже не думал, что такой вариант возможен...

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: You always manage to surprise me, Sergey.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Ты всегда мог удивить меня, Сергей.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Are you also responsible for the \c[1]insane amount of damage\c[0] she's dealing?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: И это ты ответственен за то \c[1]безумное количество урона\c[0], которое она наносит?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Ah...\. yes.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Ах...\. да.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Though it wasn't intended... and unfortunately I couldn't remove it once I got her into the game.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Но это не было задумано... и, к сожалению, я не смог убрать это после того, как добавил её в игру.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: \c[1]Great work\c[0].\. That duel sure was a lot of fun.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: \c[1]Прекрасная работа\c[0].\. Эта дуэль была очень весёлой.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Anyway.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: В любом случае.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: It is nothing, please go on.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Пустяки, пожалуйста, продолжай.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Right.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Хорошо.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Let me tell you what happened after Gautham, Shizuka, and I left Instatainment.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Позвольте мне рассказать вам, что произошло после того, как мы с Гаутамом и Шизукой покинули Instatainment.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Isn't the weather just fantastic today?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Сегодня фантастическая погода, не правда ли?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Indeed! The sun is shining, it's fantastic, the best!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Несомненно! Солнце светит, фантастика, красота!

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Let's all go out and play!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Пойдёмте прогуляемся и поиграем!

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Yes, let's go out and play!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Да, давайте выйдем и поиграем!

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Plaaay!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Играаать!

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: But before that I have to finish work.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Но перед этим мне нужно закончить работу.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Awwwww...
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Ээээээх...

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: The crime rate has developed quite unfavorably recently.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Уровень преступности в последнее время развился весьма неблагоприятно.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: It has. And at the same time, we're lacking in manpower.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Так и есть. И в то же время нам недостаёт рабочей силы.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: If this continues, I'm not sure we can keep protecting our citizens.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Если так будет продолжаться, я не уверен, что мы сможем защитить наших граждан.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Sad, but true...
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Печально, но факт...

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I hear they discovered a new entrance to the temple in the mountains.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Я слышала, они обнаружили новый вход в храм среди гор.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Oh! Do you think we can still find new treasure in there?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Ох! Думаешь, мы ещё сможем найти там новые сокровища?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Definitely, but we have to hurry! Everybody is no preparing to enter the place, soon!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Конечно, но мы должны поспешить! Пока кто-нибудь другой не опередил нас!

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Right, we should start preparations at once!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Хорошо, мы должны начать подготовку немедленно!

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I hear they discovered a new entrance to the temple in the mountains.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Я слышала, они обнаружили новый вход в храм среди гор.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Oh! Do you think we can still find new treasure in there?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Ох! Думаешь, мы ещё сможем найти там новые сокровища?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Definitely, but we have to hurry! Everybody is now preparing to enter the place, soon!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Конечно, но мы должны поспешить! Пока кто-нибудь другой не опередил нас!

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Right, we should start preparations at once!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Хорошо, мы должны начать подготовку немедленно!

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: We Shad a very noble folks, related to Ancients!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Мы, шады, очень благородный народ, восходящий к Древним!

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Yes, but we have trouble with Human tongue!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Да, но у нас проблемы с человеческим языком!

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Yes, but that because human tongue really trouble some. Too many word and weird rules!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Да, но это потому, что человеческий язык слишком сложный. Слишком много слов и странных правил!

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: So true! We should help human make language simple!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Это верно! Мы должны помочь людям сделать язык проще!

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Great idea!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Отличная идея!

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: We Shad a very noble folks, related to Ancients!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Мы, шады, очень благородный народ, восходящий к Древним!

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Yes, but we have trouble with Human tongue!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Да, но у нас проблемы с человеческим языком!

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Yes, but that because human tongue really trouble some. Too many word and weird rules!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Да, но это потому, что человеческий язык слишком сложный. Слишком много слов и странных правил!

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: So true! We should help human make language simple!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Это верно! Мы должны помочь людям сделать язык проще!

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Great idea!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Отличная идея!

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: The crime rate has developed quite unfavorably recently.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Уровень преступности в последнее время развился весьма неблагоприятно.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: It has. And at the same time, we're lacking in manpower.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Так и есть. И в то же время нам недостаёт рабочей силы.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: If this continues, I'm not sure we can keep protecting our citizens.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Если так будет продолжаться, я не уверен, что мы сможем защитить наших граждан.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Sad, but true...
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Печально, но факт...

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: The stocks have been rather good this week.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Акции на этой неделе были довольно хорошими.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Very much, I made a good fortune.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Определённо, я сделал большое состояние.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Speculation and stuff.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Спекуляции и всё такое.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Business, business.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Бизнес, бизнес.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Privatize everything!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Приватизировать всё!

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: The stocks have been rather good this week.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Акции на этой неделе были довольно хорошими.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Very much, I made a good fortune.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Определённо, я сделал большое состояние.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Speculation and stuff.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Спекуляции и всё такое.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Business, business.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Бизнес, бизнес.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Privatize everything!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Приватизировать всё!

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Well...\. Not that it mattered to me.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Ну...\. Не то чтобы это имело для меня какое-то значение.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Do you mean...\. your heart disease?\. Please do not tell me...
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Ты имеешь в виду...\. свою болезнь сердца?\. Пожалуйста, не говори мне...

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I'm sorry...\. The Satoshi you knew died two years ago.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Мне жаль...\. Сатоши, которого ты знал, умер два года назад.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Standing in front of you...\. is the \c[3]Evotar of Satoshi\c[0].
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Тот, что стоит перед тобой...\. это \c[3]эвотар Сатоши\c[0].

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: No...
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Нет...

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I myself created this copy as an offer to Mr. Sidwell, so I could continue to serve him.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Я сам создал эту копию в качестве предложения мистеру Сидвеллу, чтобы продолжать служить ему.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: In return, I wanted him to let Shizuka go.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Взамен я хотел, чтобы он отпустил Шизуку.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I was naive to ever think he'd fulfill his end of the agreement.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Я был наивен, полагая, что он выполнит свою часть соглашения.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I...\. I cannot believe this...
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Я...\. Я не могу в это поверить...

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Don't feel sorry, Sergey.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Не надо сожалений, Сергей.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Nothing could have been done about my disease anyway.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: С моей болезнью всё равно ничего нельзя было поделать.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Becoming an Evotar was the only option for me to stay in this world.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Стать эвотаром было единственной возможностью для меня остаться в этом мире.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: We need to switch rooms now.\. Otherwise the masking will lose its effect.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Нам нужно сменить комнату.\. Иначе маскировка потеряет свой эффект.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Follow me.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Следуйте за мной.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Satoshi...
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Сатоши...

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Hi!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Привет!

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: You two are still at it?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Вы двое по-прежнему занимаетесь этим?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I think we're done for the most part.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Думаю, что по большей части мы закончили.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Though there is one more thing.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Хотя есть кое-что ещё.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Shizuka, how is \c[3]Gautham\c[0] doing these days?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Шизука, как поживает \c[3]Гаутам\c[0]?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Well...\. I didn't speak much with him recently.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Ну...\. в последнее время мы почти не разговаривали.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: He's busy designing his levels and flying around in his fancy avatar.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Он занят проектированием уровней и полётами в своём причудливом аватаре.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: He seems content enough.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Его, кажется, всё устраивает.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Gautham... it might be especially difficult to get him out of this.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Гаутам... будет особенно трудно вытащить его из этого.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: We did in fact meet him while we were in Evotarground.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: А ведь мы встречались с ним, когда были в зоне эвотаров.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: From what we saw... it looked like he is physically located in the Playground. Could that be the case?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Исходя из того, что мы видели... кажется, что он физически находится в игровой зоне. Может ли такое быть?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Yes.\. Somehow, Sidwell convinced him to do that.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Да.\. Каким-то образом Сидвелл убедил его сделать это.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: It is easier to keep him under control that way.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Так легче держать его под контролем.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: And well...\. Gautham was always excited about creating his own worlds.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Ну и...\. Гаутам всегда был увлечён созданием собственных миров.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: The prospect of experiencing it in person was quite appealing to him.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Перспектива испытать это на себе была весьма привлекательна для него.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Really...\. I think he's a lost cause.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Знаешь...\. я думаю, что он безнадёжен.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: He's stuck in his fantasy world, playing his little god figure...
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Он застрял в своём мире фантазий, играя в маленького бога...

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: That blue avatar with orange clothing?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Тот синий аватар в оранжевой одежде?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Yes, that's him.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Да, это он.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: That is... unexpected. He acts like such a different character.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Это... неожиданно. Он ведёт себя как совсем другой персонаж.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: That's the whole point.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: В этом весь смысл.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: In any case, we should try to figure out if he's on our side with this or not.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: В любом случае, мы должны попытаться выяснить, на нашей он стороне или нет.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Shizuka, can you try talking to him about this?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Шизука, ты можешь обсудить это с ним?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Just hinting at what is happening?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Просто намекнуть на то, что происходит?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I can try...
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Я постараюсь...

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Well then... I think I have a good grasp of the situation now.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Ну что же... я думаю, что теперь хорошо понимаю ситуацию.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: We will need time for preparations though.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Однако нам нужно время для подготовки.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Certainly. If you have any more questions, you know how to reach me.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Несомненно. Если у вас есть ещё вопросы, вы знаете, как со мной связаться.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Yes...\. I am glad I was able to meet both of you again.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Да...\. Я рад, что смог снова встретиться с вами.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Same for me.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Я тоже рад.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: One last thing, though.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: И последнее.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Yes?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Да?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Looking at what Sidwell accomplished so far, I'm certain he has specific ways to track your actions.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Глядя на то, чего достиг Сидвелл, я убеждён, что у него есть способы отслеживать твои действия.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Because of that, please be extra careful if you plan to involve any other player.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Поэтому, пожалуйста, будьте особенно осторожны, если собираетесь привлекать других игроков.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I will... and I already have my suspects.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Несомненно... и у меня уже были подозрения.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Well then...\. goodbye and see you soon.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Ну что же...\. прощайте, скоро увидимся.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Goodbye.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Пока.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Take care.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Береги себя.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Bye!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Пока!

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: You too, Lea.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Ты тоже, Лея.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Okay, where to start...?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Хорошо, с чего начать...?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I looked a bit more into the technical side of things.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Я немного углубился в техническую сторону дела.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: The Evotar Server is most likely derived from an old version of the official game servers.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Сервер эвотаров, скорее всего, основан на старой версии официальных игровых серверов.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: That means it should be vulnerable to a certain DDoS attack we experienced in the past.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Это значит, что он должен быть уязвим к определённым DDoS-атакам, испытываемым нами в прошлом.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Oh... using the hit-stun-overflow issue?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: А... используя уязвимость hit-stun-overflow?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Correct!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Верно!

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Now please for us common folks, too.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: А теперь, пожалуйста, и для простых людей типа нас.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Well, in other words...\. there is a way to make the Evotar Server \c[3]crash\c[0].
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Ну, другими словами...\. есть способ \c[3]сломать\c[0] сервер эвотаров.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Crash very, very badly.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Очень, очень серьёзно сломать.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Once it happens, Sidwell will have a hard time restarting it.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Как только это произойдёт, у Сидвелла будут большие проблемы с его перезапуском.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Thus, the server will not respond to anything, including queries to wipe the data.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Следовательно, сервер перестанет отвечать на все запросы, включая запросы на стирание данных.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: That will give us enough time for Lea to reach it physically.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Это даст нам достаточно времени, чтобы Лея смогла добраться до него физически.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: That sounds very promising!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Звучит многообещающе!

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: So, how exactly will it work?\. How do we make it crash?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Так как именно это работает?\. Как мы сломаем сервер?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: The keys are the \c[3]Evotars\c[0] running around Vermillion Wasteland.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Ключ - это \c[3]эвотары\c[0], бегающие по Пустоши Вермиллион.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: We need to subject them to a certain type of field effect, as many and as quickly as possible.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Нам нужно подвергнуть их определённому типу эффекта поля, как можно больше и как можно быстрее.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: If we succeed, things should overflow on the Server, making it crash.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Если мы преуспеем в этом, то сервер должен переполниться, что приведёт к сбою системы.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: However, for this to work...\. we will need a lot more players to participate.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Однако, чтобы это сработало...\. нам понадобится гораздо больше игроков.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: That's why I plan to involve a few other players, specifically those Lea has met before.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Вот почему я планирую привлечь других игроков, а конкретно тех, с кем Лея встречалась раньше.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Involving other players...
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Вовлечение других игроков...

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I suppose it's a risk we have to take.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Полагаю, что это риск, на который нам придётся пойти.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I currently see no other options, unfortunately.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: В текущей ситуации я не вижу никаких других вариантов, к сожалению.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: So...\. what about me?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Так...\. что насчёт меня?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I can't enter the official Playground, but I can move around Vermillion Wasteland.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Я не могу попасть в официальную игровую зону, но я могу передвигаться по Пустоши Вермиллион.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Should I help?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Вам нужна моя помощь?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Hm...\. I think it would be better if you avoid logging into the game while we storm the Evotarground.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Хм...\. я думаю, будет лучше, если ты не будешь входить в игру, пока мы штурмуем зону эвотаров.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Since Sidwell is aware of your current location outside the game, you need to be quickly relocated.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Поскольку Сидвелл знает о твоём текущем местоположении в реальной жизни, тебе нужно быстро передислоцироваться.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Otherwise, things will end with him taking you hostage.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Иначе всё закончится тем, что он возьмёт тебя в заложники.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Right...\. there is the real life side of things as well.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Верно...\. ведь ещё есть и реальная жизнь.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: One last thing, did you manage to talk with Gautham?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: И последнее, ты поговорила с Гаутамом?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I tried.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Я пыталась.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: He has been acting...\. very strange.\. Even more strangely than usual.\. And that's saying a lot.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Он вёл себя...\. очень странно.\. Даже более странно, чем обычно.\. И это говорит о многом.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Once I mentioned Lea, he started raving about how she managed to escape his dungeon tower.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Как только я упомянула Лею, он начал гневно кричать о том, как ей удалось сбежать из его подземелья.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I guess you really left an impact.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Видимо, ты действительно задела его за живое.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Anyway...\. I decided I'd better not tell him too much.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: В любом случае...\. я решила, что лучше не рассказывать ему слишком много.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Really...\. he's pretty much turned into a nutcase by now.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Ведь он...\. и так уже почти сошёл с ума.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: ... That is worrisome.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: ...Это меня и тревожит.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: We will see if we can drag him out somehow.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Посмотрим, сможем ли мы как-нибудь вытащить его.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: I know a few people from the maintenance crew that might be able to help us with this.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Я знаю несколько человек из обслуживающего персонала, которые могли бы помочь нам с этим.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Good...\. then how do we proceed?
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Хорошо...\. тогда как мы поступим?

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: For now, we should call it a day.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: На сегодня стоит закончить.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: As soon as I have everything prepared, Lea and I will try to gather the other players.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Как только я всё подготовлю, мы с Леей постараемся собрать остальных игроков.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: And once we have the help we need, we start with the plan as soon as possible.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: И как только мы получим всю требуемую помощь, мы приступим к исполнению плана.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Alright, let's give it our best shot.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Хорошо, давайте сделаем всё возможное.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: That we will.\. See you soon!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Согласен.\. Скоро увидимся!

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Goodnight.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Спокойной ночи.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Bye!
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Пока!

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Sergey...\. you did it.
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Сергей...\. у тебя получилось.

maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.orig: Unexpected Error
maps/hideout/inner-office.json/entities/.text: Непредвиденная ошибка
